feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 04:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
